titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries for the vessel ANNANDALE.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 9/18/2000--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for the vessel ANNANDALE for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries.
